gameDetails.name: Police Precinct: Dice Tower Exclusive Character Set
gameDetails.description:
2 Character Boards that were available during the Kickstarter for Police Precinct: ONLINE!

Includes:
Richard Austria
Rapport: As a trained experience Community Resource Officer you can impact situations others can't:
At any time you can turn in a donut to add or subtract a pip to any die rolled in relation to your location if any punk tokens are also present

Respect: They look up to you, so interviewing juveniles when they are away from their cohorts works well:
At the end of your turn you may draw an investigation card from any deck if you are parked next to a lone punk token

Michelle Schroeder
Unorthodox: At any time before taking your action, you may discard any one of your police cards to temporarily increase your strength in any area by 1 (e.g. investigation goes from 2 up to 3)
Underdog: As a community service officer, you get more donuts for arresting than others (one donut for 1 or 2 punk tokens and two donuts for 3 or more punks)

Note: Richard Austria was available as part of a package during the 2016 Dice Tower Kickstarter, and Michelle Schroeder via the 2016 Dice Tower Convention in Orlando Florida.
